Kind regards,

Nichole

Nichole Valk

m: 0425 699 660

e: nvalk@avisogroup.com.au | w: avisogroup.com.au

Hi Nichole, 

It may, but it would be highly unlikely. I have refreshed the cache regardless on the site, just in case. Kerry may need to clear her browser cache as she may be seeing the old version of the site still. I'm sure Ronel will guide her through that as a first step. 

Let me know how it goes?

Hi Heath


Quick one to check your side (I'm sure it's fine) - I saw Allsafe.com.au includes a caching plugin, would this affect below at all? It's fine my side and not an issue but wanted to check.


The only other thing is the site is saying the plugin 'Search everything' is having an issue - was this one you added at installation time? Just checking as I can recall what/who this is from.


Thanks again!


Kind regards,
Nichole


Nichole Valk
m: 0425 699 660
e: nvalk@avisogroup.com.au | w: avisogroup.com.au

Hi Kerry,

Welcome back & happy new year.

This is current on the website & to all external computers, so something must be blocking or caching from an IT/desktop perspective internally. Ronel I'll leave with you to investigate what the issue may be?

https://allsafe.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/Allsafe-FSG-v19-16th-September-2019.pdf
"Allsafe FSG Version 19 effective 16th September 2019" - latest PDF.

Thanks,
Nichole

Ticket Title:

FW: Update Allsafe Website - FSG Version in Key Documents


Ticket Description:

From Nichole Valk <nvalk@avisogroup.com.au>: Hi Ronel & Anthony


I've been having discussions with Kerry at Allsafe about their website. For some reason an old document is showing up/reverting to (which is actually deleted from the new version of the website). However, all staff at Allsafe seem to have this old document showing up and not the new one (FSG version 2019). They also can't access the website from their mobile phones from the office wifi.


It's on this page:

https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fallsafe.com.au%2fkey-documents%2f&c=E,1,Y4-F2KVDunAPhNy8auV5cOVxaBjt_Ut4-aure4GdUI8hIBVRTsU5eopVGQBwfQTUgQXTozbtZGHqPn9X0ymb5bi4ajEWHZayop-MziChXGVhUPQ92Bwe7Kk,&typo=1

This is the document that should eb showing up: https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fallsafe.com.au%2fwp-content%2fuploads%2f2019%2f09%2fAllsafe-FSG-v19-16th-September-2019.pdf&c=E,1,vkWg6iEqBX7aMObLfDpoObDMomrIWzZg3PCvCb_gL0zQvAGbhQ5svXL16bti1AJu0pngM2jhh2bJsd1dO7S-Oaa4mRAYc_bKCdeJiLxbQs2hu0LTQq8,&typo=1

(below is the issue Kerry is having - keeps reverting to a 2018 doc).


It works for me 100% but doesn't work for all Allsafe staff - could the issue be from their wifi / or something reverting to the old dns?


The new DNS is what was updated (in attached email) to the new hosting.


[cid:image001.png@01D5B4E2.5A176970]


Can you shed light on this issue and fix within Allsafe to ensure their staff are accessing only the latest version of the website??


Kind regards,

Nichole


Nichole Valk
